attr.title: Fran Bow
attr.desc: Fran Bow is a psychological horror adventure game. It combines elements of point-and-click gameplay with a dark, eerie narrative that explores themes of mental illness and trauma.
attr.inst: Download the game of steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/362680/?curator_clanid=4777282 and copy all of the files from "Fran Bow GameMaker" to franbow/gamedata
